content: As you leave the crevice with the Man-in-Stone, stick to the left wall going up to find several paths leading toward the large cave. Halfway up this sloping path just above where the Man-in-Stone is in the crevice below, you’ll find another of the large stone heads chanting, and can claim it’s Buddha’s Eyeball.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'The Fourth Buddha’s Eyeball'.
The content is as follows:
As you leave the crevice with the Man-in-Stone, stick to the left wall going up to find several paths leading toward the large cave. Halfway up this sloping path just above where the Man-in-Stone is in the crevice below, you’ll find another of the large stone heads chanting, and can claim it’s Buddha’s Eyeball.
